accueil.introduction: This application will allow you to manage your Puyfolais activity within the association.
accueil.start: To get started, please log in by clicking on the icon in the top right corner.

sign.emailEnvoye: An email has been sent to the address {{mail}} with a link to reset your password.
sign.validationInscription: Your registration has been successfully completed! You are now logged in. However, no profile has been assigned to you yet. Please wait for an administrator to assign these profiles to you before using the application.

identifiants.invalides: The provided credentials are invalid. Please try again.
identifiants.existants: This email is already in use, please use your associated credentials to log in.

admin.introduction: Here you can access the application settings (user, structure, options...).

utilisateurs.introduction: Here you can manage application users.

structures.introduction: Here you can manage association structures.

saisons.blocageSuppression: You cannot delete seasons with existing sessions.

edition.messageChevauchement: The entered period overlaps with an existing period.
edition.messageDatesErronees: Start date is greater than end date.
